QuestData.Title: Plan B
QuestData.Description: Okay, don't panic! The blaster might not've worked, but we still have options.$B$B<Crafty snaps her fingers.>$B$BWe're going to divert attention away from the airstrip! To make this work, we'll need a few things first.$B$B<Wobblesprocket looks you up and down appraisingly.>$B$BSteeljaw's caravan, just to the west, stupidly took a shortcut through a taunka graveyard and was destroyed by their risen spirits.$B$BHead over there and get some outfits off of the dead orcs. Pick up one of their banners, too!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Warsong Outfits and a Warsong Banner. Bring them back to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestData.CompletionText: We'll need lots of their clothes if this is going to work. I'm no seamstress... we'll just have to find something to fit you!$B$BAnd then I'll just add a touch of my engineer genius, and poof, you'll look the part you need to play.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice, but those clothes reek!$B$BPersonally, you'd never catch me dead in such rags. But we're going to have to sort through them and find some that fit your, um... figure.
